revised_title: Investigating the Nervous and Circulatory Systems in Myriapoda and Macrourous Arachnida
tldr: The author examines the structure and development of the nervous and circulatory systems in Myriapoda and Macrourous Arachnida, focusing on the Chilognatha, Chilopoda, and Scorpions. The study investigates the anatomy of the nervous cord and its ganglia, the existence of a complete circulatory system, and the relationship between the nervous and circulatory systems in these organisms.
